entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
